name: CTMB
short_description:
CTMB (Crazy Tiny Message Board) - A simple message board that runs on a flatfile database. Includes Users (With password support), a admin panel for removing users, and validating them for post, and reply rights, and themes

---New Features!!---
*Added independent avatar support
*Added Categories
*User colors, and ranks
*Admin panel
*User logins (sessions)

---Requirements---
PHP 5.1+
Upload support
